name: Autocomplete
desc: Allow the user to press tab to autocomplete a command for the app

name: Create a colored version of the app
desc: Use the colored library for Rust to create a colored variant of the base application. Makes a better looking app.

name: Add a completion status
desc: Would flesh out the app more by adding this new feature. You can keep tasks and mark them as completed instead of simply deleting a task when it is finished.

name: Reveal empty strings
desc: The user might enter an empty string. This is bad because the program takes it as input but when it prints it out, it's hard to locate the empty string. There needs to be a way to reveal an empty string.

name: Fix formatting
desc: Once tasks start getting long descriptions, it's practically unreadable. We need this fixed.
